title: why don't i have daily mission's?
body:
So i just noticed that when i was playing with a friend who was sitting next to me that he had a daily win mission, and i don't. he is level 19 and had it already when he was 17. 

I'm still level 12 a shame, but does it have anything to do with buying a charackter or reaching a certain level? i have had mission's before that where the end season 7 mission's, and nothing afther that anymore. 

Does somebody know the awnser cuz i don't and its not to be found on the internet

replies.body: What from I could find it looks like the first win of the day missions doesn't kick in until level 15 currently.
